name: Catventure (itch)
description:
Gather cats in your garden and face powerful monsters in the night dungeon! Because that's what cats do! 

Feed your cat some water! If the dispenser is out of water, cats are going to die. :(

Battle phase is a bit of a mess: You've got two mode: attack mode and defense mode. The boss got two modes also: idle and attack. If he engages the attack mode, you need to go in defense mode or you'll lose some cats when the monster strikes.

You're not doing damages while in defense mode.

The game is infinite, so don't lose too much time :p
